headline: 5 Infrastructure REITs Quietly Powering AI While Getting No Credit for It
summary: While Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) stock surged 34.9% over the past year and the S&P 500 gained 12.2%, the infrastructure REITs powering AI’s physical backbone have been left behind. These five companies house, cool, and connect the servers running ChatGPT and Gemini, yet their stock performance has lagged far behind Nvidia and the broader market. They ... 5 Infrastructure REITs Quietly Powering AI While Getting No Credit for It

headline: Crown Castle (CCI) Faces DISH Fallout, Analysts Split on Outlook
summary: Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) is one of the best infrastructure stocks to buy right now. On February 9, Citizens analyst Greg Miller reaffirmed a Market Outperform rating and $125 price target on Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) following Q4 2025 results. Miller attributed quarterly headwinds to ongoing disputes with former DISH Network clients after tower agreement […]
